snippet: A spokesman for the family of Adam Lanza said Peter Lanza received his son’s remains at the Connecticut chief medical examiner’s office.
abstract: Spokesman for the family of Newtown, Conn, gunman Adam Lanza confirms that it was Peter Lanza who received his son’s remains at the Connecticut chief medical examiner’s office.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for the family of Adam Lanza said Peter Lanza received his son’s remains at the Connecticut chief medical examiner’s office.
